summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning; amending the provisions of and extending the term of the rezone and Property Use and Development Agreement approved by Ordinance 117117 and extended by Ordinance 118168 for the property located at 9461 Olson Place Southwest; accepting a Second Amendment to Property Use and Development Agreement providing for such amendments to provisions and extension; and directing that a copy of this Ordinance and the attached Amendment to Property Use and Development Agreement be placed in C.F. 299197.
